Articles.Content:
I am a very lazy man and I would like to know: "How much liquid fuel are you able to get in a stable orbit with only one launch?"

No mods, no cheats and no changes on any files.

My personal record stands at 87.500 unit of liquid fuel with a sandbox ship which would cost 5.275.000,- in career mode.

What is possible?
Depends on how much part your computer can handle.
